title: The X Future
subject: Password reset request
content:
Hi {{name}},
You are receiving this email because you have requested for a password reset for your account.
You can reset your password by clicking this link
If you did not request this, please let us know immediately by emailing support@thexfuture.com
Thanks

The X Future Team

This is no reply email. In case you have any questions please contact at support@thexfuture.com
© The X Future . 2020 All Rights Reserved

title: The X Future
subject: Your password has been changed
content:
Hi {{name}},
Your password for the account with {{email}} has been changed.
Click here to continue to login.
This is not you? Please report to us immediately by emailing support@thexfuture.com.
Thanks

The X Future Team

This is no reply email. In case you have any questions please contact at support@thexfuture.com
© The X Future . 2020 All Rights Reserved

title: [TXF Enterprise Innovation Platform] Someone from your organization has requested to be part of Enterprise Innovation Platform
subject: [TXF Enterprise Innovation Platform] Someone from your organization has requested to be part of Enterprise Innovation Platform
content:
Hi {{corpadmin_name}},
A new user with {{applyingEmail}} of your organization reached out to apply to be part Enterprise Innovation Platform.
You can add {{applyingName}} to become a member from your dashboard by sharing a use case or a solution with them.
Thanks

The X Future Team

This is no reply email. In case you have any questions please contact at janus@thexfuture.com
© The X Future . 2020 All Rights Reserved

title: The X Future Team
subject: Your application was submitted confirmation
content:
Hi {{name}},
Thank you for applying to The X Future.
Please allow 3-5 business days for our business team to review your application. Once approved you will be alerted and receive a confirmation email.
Please send a mail to {{support_email}}, if you have any question or just want to say hi!
Thanks

The X Future Team

This is no reply email. In case you have any questions please contact at support@thexfuture.com
© The X Future . 2020 All Rights Reserved

title: The X Future Team

content:
Hi {{name}},

Thanks

The X Future Team

This is no reply email. In case you have any questions please contact at support@thexfuture.com
